sentences.sCn: 喔唷， 这么大的西瓜!

sentences.sContent: The pulp of this watermelon is too spongy.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pulp of this watermelon is too spongy.

sentences.sContent: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.

remMethod.val: water (水) +melon (瓜) →水分很足的瓜→西瓜

trans.tranOther: a large round fruit with hard green skin, red flesh, and black seeds
